attributes.action: Stop benefits to people who can work but don't
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i ask why do valuble goverment funds go to people who can work for a living but don't? why why why? i belive the goverment with tighter laws around the governing of benefits, would have a considerable amount of money to spend on the public services and defence. 
people should work for there money not just get it free for nothing. this country has become unfair for those who sucseed in life. if you work your very hardest u get nothing from this goverment. but if u scrounge, complain and laze about then u get the world on a platter.

Sign the petition and mabye we can change this 'scrounging' culture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
